name: Circlet
description: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
24 mana, 0.1 mana regeneration and 0.2% flat base magic resistance
2 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
2.7 main attack damage to universal heroes
trivia: This item is based on the Circlet of Nobility from Warcraft 3
In DotA, the item is named Circlet of Nobility as well

recentChanges.description: Now builds into Urn of Shadows
No longer builds into Urn of Shadows
